TitleEnglish: Slam Dunk: Roar!! Basket Man Spirit
SummaryEnglish: Tells that Rukawa's middle school kouhai Ichiro Mizusawa will be paralyzed soon and wishes to have one last game against Rukawa.
Aliases: Slam Dunk: Hoero Basketman-damashii! Hanamichi to Rukawa no Atsuki Natsu
Slam Dunk Movie 4, Roar Basketman's Soul: Hanamichi and Rukawa's Burning Summer
